entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Becoming a few clouds after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 9.
